Keywords: Cosmic , Frightful Four , Skrulls , Soldier , Warrior
Real Name: Kl'rt
Special Powers
THE POWERS OF THE FANTASTIC FOUR: At the beginning of your turn, choose two. Super Skrull has the listed effects until your next turn. INVISIBLE WOMAN: Sidestep, Stealth, Barrier as FREE but only to generate one marker. THE THING: Charge, Impervious, Close Combat Expert. MR. FANTASTIC: Plasticity, Super Senses, Giant Reach: 4. HUMAN TORCH: Running Shot, Energy Explosion, range of 6.

I just realized the Super Skrull's slight flaw... WK hasn't made a United Front keyword.
February 24, 2021
Goop
I would imagine 90% of the time you are going to be selecting Mr Fantastic and Thing and only maybe occasionally using Sue to get in position. With Skrull TA he's got that 50/50 shape change on his opening click. Good at all of his lines.
November 11, 2020
tidge
It should come as no surprise that the Super Skrull is going to be the lynch pin of any Skrulls force. I find it only mildly disappointing that multiples of this SR (played at lower point values) are going to be vastly more effective than any combination of the true 'generic' pieces. This is a dial that would have been considered game-breaking in past eras, but is now pretty much a solid contender for 'being worth its cost' at all point values.
August 1, 2020
peeterparkker
The mind control at the end of his dial is a really nice touch.

My favorite piece from the set. Choose Thing and Mr. Fantastic for potentially three roll offs! He's going to be very tough to take down!
